doc.field: This data set contains locks & dams. The outlines are derived from aerial photography observation and interpretation utilizing stereo processing techniques. Vector line work was originally stereo plotted from 2003 photography. Graphical lines contain a character based layer name that identifies the different mapping features. The flight height for the aerial photography utilized in this project is approximately 5000 feet. The mapping scale for aerial photography utilized in this project is 1 inch equals 833 feet.

<?xml version="1.0"?><metadata> <idinfo><citation><citeinfo><title>Ramsey County Dams</title><origin>Ramsey County</origin><pubinfo><publish>Ramsey County</publish></pubinfo><pubdate>Periodically revised</pubdate><onlink /></citeinfo></citation><descript><abstract>This data set contains locks & dams. The outlines are derived from aerial photography observation and interpretation utilizing stereo processing techniques. Vector line work was originally stereo plotted from 2003 photography. Graphical lines contain a character based layer name that identifies the different mapping features. The flight height for the aerial photography utilized in this project is approximately 5000 feet. The mapping scale for aerial photography utilized in this project is 1 inch equals 833 feet.</abstract><purpose>Water structures residing in this data set support many functions including thematic mapping, land records, property assessment, surveying and engineering projects.</purpose><supplinf>Ramsey County</supplinf></descript><timeperd><timeinfo><sngdate><caldate>20030408</caldate></sngdate></timeinfo><current>Data is based upon the most recent aerial photography available.</current></timeperd><status><progress>Complete</progress><update>Scheduled to be updated every 3 years.</update></status><spdom><bounding><westbc>-93.2294</westbc><eastbc>-92.9817</eastbc><northbc>45.1255</northbc><southbc>44.8895</southbc></bounding></spdom><keywords><place><placekey>Minnesota, Ramsey County</placekey></place><theme><themekey>Locks, dams, water structures</themekey><themekt>None</themekt></theme></keywords><accconst>This data set is available to everyone. Fees and policy are published in the Ramsey County Fee Schedule. Charges are variable and are subject to change. See the Ramsey County Fee Schedule for specific information on fees and policy.</accconst><useconst>The data is Copyright by the County of Ramsey. All rights reserved. Except as expressly provided herein, no part of this data may be copied, reproduced, sold, transferred, or transmitted in any form, or by any means, whether graphic, electronic, or mechanical, including photocopying, recording, or by an information storage or retrieval system, without express prior written permission of the County of Ramsey.</useconst><ptcontac><cntinfo><cntperp><cntper>Curt Peterson</cntper><cntorg>Ramsey County Surveyor's Office</cntorg></cntperp><cntpos>GIS Supervisor</cntpos><cntaddr><address>1425 Paul Kirkwold Dr</address><city>Arden Hills</city><state>MN</state><postal>55112</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651-266-7172</cntvoice><cntfax>651-266-7180</cntfax><cntemail>curtis.peterson@co.ramsey.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></ptcontac><browse><browsen>http://www.co.ramsey.mn.us/cs/docs/dams.pdf</browsen><browsed /></browse><crossref><citeinfo><title>Graphic: Airports (Runways and taxiways) Bridges (Bridges and overpasses) Bridge Lines (Outlines of bridges and overpasses) Dams (Locks and dams) Dam Lines (Outlines of locks and dams) Pools (Archived as of 1996 - data is not scheduled to be updated) Buildings (Structures >=80 sq. ft.) Building Lines (Outline of structures >= 80 sq. ft.) Water (Open water areas) Waterlines (Outlines of open water areas) Water Towers Water Tower Lines (Outlines of water towers) Trees (Boulevard, St Paul only; Archived as of 1985 - data is not scheduled for update) Roads (Road edges - thoroughfares and cul-de-sacs) Railroads (Centerline of tracks) PLS (Public Land Survey)</title></citeinfo></crossref><native>Microsoft Windows 2000 Version 5.0 (Build 2195) Service Pack 4; ESRI ArcCatalog 8.3.0.800</native></idinfo><dataqual><attracc><attraccr>Feature attributes are identified using analytical and softcopy photogrammetric compilation methods. Automated GIS processes supplement the photo identified feature attributing with the numerical parameters.</attraccr></attracc><logic>Graphical elements are topologically clean as the majority of the linework is intended to create closed boundaries or polygons. The linework represents physical features existing at the time of data collection.
The aerotriangulation solutions, model set-ups, existing DEM reference models, and the ground control assured the integrity of the spatial relationships among the planimetric, drainage, and road features collected.</logic><complete>All features of this type photogrammetrically identifiable within the Ramsey County coverage are included.</complete><posacc><horizpa><horizpar>Analytical Aerial Triangulation Summary Date: 05-30-03. This data meets or exceeds the National Map Accuracy Standard (NMAS) - 1/30 of 1 inch at map scale.</horizpar></horizpa><vertacc><vertaccr>Not Applicable as it pertains to a two-dimensional Arc/INFO Coverage. However, during feature compilation the vertical accuarcy meets NMAS - 1/6000 of flight height above mean terrain.</vertaccr></vertacc></posacc><lineage><procstep><procdesc>Color aerial photography and airborne GPS used for aerotriangulation. Aerotrianglution solution used with analytical and soft-copy Stereo plotters to collect limited planimetric feature. LIDAR DEM provide by Ramsey County under separate contract with Waggoner Inc. of Jackson, Mississippi was used to create digital ortho images.</procdesc></procstep><srcinfo><srcscale>2400</srcscale></srcinfo></lineage></dataqual><spdoinfo><indspref /><direct>Vector</direct><mgmg3obj /><mgmg3til /></spdoinfo><spref><horizsys><geograph><latres /><longres /></geograph><planar><gridsys><gridsysn>County Coordinates</gridsysn><utm><utmzone /></utm><spcs><spcszone /></spcs><mgmg4coz>43</mgmg4coz><mgmg4adj /></gridsys><mapproj><mapprojn /><mgmg4par /><otherprj /></mapproj><planci><plandu>Feet</plandu><coordrep><absres /><ordres /></coordrep></planci></planar><geodetic><ellips>GRS80</ellips><horizdn>NAD83</horizdn></geodetic></horizsys></spref><eainfo><overview><eaover>Arc/INFO Coverage Attribute Table derived from DXFARC, .acode table joined to .aat with dropitem dxf-handle. Entity Type Label encoded in dxf-layer.</eaover><eadetcit>Entity Attributes for Polygons: AREA PERIMETER DAMS# DAMS-ID
Entity Attributes for Lines: FNODE# TNODE# LPOLY# RPOLY# LENGTH DAMS# DAMS-ID DXF-LAYER DXF-COLOR DXF-THICKNESS DXF-TYPE DXF-ELEVATION DXF-CURVE
Look Up Table: (Dxf_layer) Dam Types: DAM Locks and dams</eadetcit></overview></eainfo><distinfo><distrib><cntinfo><cntperp><cntper>David Wilford</cntper><cntorg>Ramsey County Surveyor's Office</cntorg></cntperp><cntpos>GIS Technician</cntpos><cntaddr><address>1425 Paul Kirkwold Dr</address><city>Arden Hills</city><state>MN</state><postal>55112</postal></cntaddr><cntvoice>651-266-7175</cntvoice><cntfax>651-266-7180</cntfax><cntemail>david.wilford@co.ramsey.mn.us</cntemail></cntinfo></distrib><resdesc>Ramsey County Mapping Project</resdesc><distliab>DISCLAIMER EXCEPT AS EXPRESSLY STATED HEREIN, THIS DATA IS PROVIDED AS IS WITHOUT WARRANTY OF ANY KIND, EXPRESS OR IMPLIED, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY OR FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE.
